sense.def:
Kdor je
tense
, je zaskrbljen in živčen in se ne more sprostiti.

seg.quote: They began to grow tense over the likelihood of a long delay.

sense.def:
Kadar mišice
tense
ali kadar nekdo
tenses
, mišice človekovega telesa postanejo napete in trde.

seg.quote: The man on the terrace tensed slightly.
‘What are you talking about?’ I asked, the skin of my cheek-bones tensing up.
He tensed his jaw muscles in fear.

sense.def:
Položaj ali obdobje, ki je
tense
, pri ljudeh povzroča zaskrbljenost.

seg.quote: The situation was very tense; anything might happen.

sense.def:
The tense of a verb
je oblika glagola, ki pokaže, ali govorimo o preteklosti, sedanjosti ali prihodnosti.
